code: import React from'react';import{Routes,Route,Navigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useAuth}from'./hooks/useAuth';import MainLayout from'./components/layout/MainLayout';import LoginPage from'./pages/LoginPage';import DashboardPage from'./pages/DashboardPage';import ProductionPage from'./pages/ProductionPage';import BoxManagementPage from'./pages/BoxManagementPage';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AppRoutes=()=>{const{isAuthenticated}=useAuth();if(!isAuthenticated){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/login",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LoginPage,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"*",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/login",replace:true})})]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Routes,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Route,{element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MainLayout,{}),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DashboardPage,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/production",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductionPage,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/boxes",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BoxManagementPage,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"*",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/",replace:true})})]})});};export default AppRoutes;
